item.title: My history
item.description:
Stolen idea from Sugree... 
[sajal@localhost ~]$ history|awk '{a[$2]++} END{for(i in a){printf "%5d\t%s\n",a[i],i}}'|sort -rn|head
239   ./autofollow.pl
149   ssh
96   ping
56   df
51   cd
43   ls
36   su
23   GET
22   ./gtalk.pl
18   whois
[sajal@localhost ~]$
